thread.title: Daisy Ridley won't even tell freakin' Judi Dench what 'The Last Jedi' means
thread.title_full: Daisy Ridley won't even tell freakin' Judi Dench what 'The Last Jedi' means

author: Gianluca Mezzofiore
title: Daisy Ridley won't even tell freakin' Judi Dench what 'The Last Jedi' means
text:
Daisy Ridley won't even tell freakin' Judi Dench what 'The Last Jedi' means 24 By Gianluca Mezzofiore 2017-02-09 11:14:02 UTC 
To be fair to him, this time Josh Gad really tried his best to extrapolate from Daisy Ridley a few answers to the lingering questions about the next Star Wars instalment, The Last Jedi. 
His first attempt, at the end of January, resulted in an epic failure . 
This time Gad, who is best known for his voice acting as Olaf from Frozen and is starring with Ridley in the upcoming film Murder on the Orient Express , enlisted living legend Judi Dench for his deed. I enlisted help today in my quest to get the truth from #DaisyRidley #LastJedi #DontRunFromYourFateDaisy #DameJediKnight pic.twitter.com/KiJMYE8H8L 
â€” Josh Gad (@joshgad) February 8, 2017 
As Ridley enters the trailer, she finds herself grilled by a very serious Dench, in Star Wars fancy dress: 
"Have you been tested for Midichlorians? Is [Supreme Leader] Snoke Palpatine? Are you the last Jedi? What's the deal with Rey-Lo?" Dench says. 
Naturally, Ridley knows that any reaction she has would be closely scrutinised by Star Wars fans across the globe. Very professionally, she just gives a poker face to each question. 
To which Dench replies: "Why don't you answer my damn questions?" 
The video cuts off with Ridley finally agreeing to spill all: "OK," she says.
